name: How to Listen to UK ATC Online with GlobalTuners - LiveATC UK! | inflight Video
description:
GlobalTuners is a great website that allows you to listen to live air traffic control online for the UK and a host of other countries.  In this video I'll show you how to listen to UK ATC online using GlobalTuners, and how to record GlobalTuners to use the air traffic control audio in your videos!

GlobalTuners: http://globaltuners.com
SoundTap Streaming Audio Recorder: http://www.nch.com.au/soundtap/

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSMY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo

PATREON:  http://patreon.com/inflightvideo
